conversation.title: I’m feeling uneasy
conversation.discussion: I have been experiencing chest pain and shortness of breath for the past few days. I am worried it might be something serious. Can you please advise me on what to do next?
conversation.doctorFeedback: Please schedule an ECG and chest X-ray immediately.

conversation.title: Follow-up on Heart Condition
conversation.discussion: I had a heart condition diagnosed last month, and I wanted to follow up on my treatment plan. Can you provide me with the next steps?
conversation.doctorFeedback: Continue current medication and monitor blood pressure twice daily.

testUploads.interpretation: Borderline high – monitor and reduce salt intake.

conversation.title: Fatigue & Dizziness
conversation.discussion: I've been feeling constantly tired and lightheaded even after meals.
conversation.doctorFeedback: Please do a blood sugar and urinalysis test, and report back with results.

testUploads.interpretation: Monitor for glucose levels; retest in 1 week.

conversation.title: Skin rash and itching
conversation.discussion: I've developed an itchy rash on my arms and legs. What could be the cause?
conversation.doctorFeedback: Apply antihistamine cream and avoid harsh soaps. Consider an allergy test.

conversation.title: Recurring headaches
conversation.discussion: I’ve been having migraines every week. Painkillers only give temporary relief.
conversation.doctorFeedback: Please undergo an MRI scan to rule out neurological causes.
